welcome_message_body: Welcome to Libertad, Argentina! This charming city is known for its beautiful beaches, vibrant culture, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Libertad has to offer during your stay.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Palomar Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at El Palomar Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi service is available throughout the airport.
